services.heading: Full-Stack Web Development
services.content: I offer end-to-end web development services, building robust applications with modern technologies like ReactJS, Vue.js, Node.js, and Laravel. From front-end interfaces to back-end APIs, I deliver scalable, secure, and high-performance solutions for businesses of all sizes.

services.heading: Custom API Development & Integration
services.content: Specializing in creating custom RESTful APIs and integrating third-party services to enhance your application's functionality. I work with Node.js, Express, PHP, and MySQL to design backend systems that communicate seamlessly with your front-end, ensuring a smooth and efficient user experience.

services.heading: E-commerce Solutions
services.content: I specialize in creating feature-rich e-commerce platforms using Shopify and WooCommerce, including custom themes, shopping cart integrations, and payment gateway implementations. I’ll help optimize your online store to enhance user experience and drive sales.

services.heading: Web Performance Optimization
services.content: From initial development to ongoing performance tuning, I ensure your web application runs at its best. Whether it’s optimizing load times, refactoring code for better maintainability, or updating back-end processes, I continuously monitor and enhance web apps to keep them running smoothly.

Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

experience.desc: At Synchroworks Consulting, I built dynamic, high-performance web applications using ReactJS, VueJS, and Laravel, focusing on efficient API integration with Axios and state management. I applied in-depth ReactJS concepts such as component lifecycle methods, hooks (useState, useEffect, useContext), and dynamic routing to create scalable and maintainable projects. I also optimized WordPress websites for speed and responsiveness, and customized Shopify stores to deliver tailored client solutions.

At Truxco Incorporated, I customized and optimized WordPress websites by writing clean PHP, JavaScript, and CSS, minimizing plugin usage for performance. I also developed responsive layouts with HTML5/CSS3, customized WooCommerce functionality (including payment gateway integration), and created a lightweight CMS interface for clients, while enhancing SEO and marketing efforts.

Provided client-facing technical support by reviewing and managing software licenses, maintaining asset management databases, and running custom scripts on client machines for troubleshooting and compliance. Collaborated with technical teams to optimize software lifecycle management and proactively improve licensing strategies.

Built and optimized websites using JavaScript, PHP, and HTML/CSS, with a focus on DOM manipulation, dynamic data handling, and responsive cross-browser compatibility. Translated PSD designs into functional, mobile-friendly web interfaces while improving site performance and code efficiency.

Developed and optimized websites using JavaScript, PHP frameworks, and standard HTML/CSS practices, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and responsive design. Analyzed and manipulated the DOM structure, validated dynamic data transfers between pages, and converted Photoshop (PSD) designs into fully responsive, production-ready web pages.
